## IsoWebSocket type

Isomorphic wrapper around WebSocket for compatiblity with Nodejs and Web API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IsoWebSocket = InstanceType<typeof globalThis.WebSocket | typeof nodeWs>;
```
